sn4.17:3.1: 17. Chaphassāyatanasutta
sn4.17:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn4.17:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ upādāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
sn4.17:4.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
sn4.17:5.2: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ upādāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sappahaṃseti.
sn4.17:5.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
sn4.17:5.4: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkameyyaṃ vicakkhukammāyā”ti.
sn4.17:5.5: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.17:5.6: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato avidūre mahantaṃ bhayabheravaṃ saddamakāsi, apissudaṃ pathavī maññe undrīyati.
sn4.17:5.7: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn4.17:5.9: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn4.17:5.11: Māro eso pāpimā tumhākaṃ vicakkhukammāya āgato”ti.
sn4.17:5.12: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
